articles.content: Universal/Amblin Entertainment’s Jurassic World Rebirth delivered a strong overseas start on Wednesday with $26M from 38 international box office markets, including some previews. Combined with domes… [+4960 chars]

articles.content:
The Residence is not extending its residence at Netflix.
